interestingcomments.content:
Saving RAW+JPEG into separate folders? /!/ Hi,

I usually just shoot RAW on my X100 but want to start using the JPEGs more (very good and convenient). However, I worry that if I shoot RAW+JPEG then the files would get all mixed up and downloading them into lightroom or picking the raws from the jpegs will be a pain in the ass.

Is there a way to automatically save them into separate folders?
